info.name: Coupon App API v2.2 (Admin + Stripe)
info.description: Complete API collection for the Coupon E-commerce application with Admin Dashboard, Categories, Geography & Stripe Payments

query.description: Search by title, brand, or coupon code

request.description: Search coupons by title, brand name, or coupon code (case-insensitive)

body.raw:
{
    "code": "PETLOVE50",
    "redeem_code": "SECRET123",
    "brand": "PetStore",
    "title": "50% off pet food",
    "description": "Amazing deal on all pet food",
    "discount_type": "percentage",
    "discount_amount": 50.0,
    "price": 2.99,
    "min_purchase": 10.0,
    "max_uses": 100,
    "category_id": "{{category_id}}",
    "availability_type": "local",
    "country_ids": ["{{country_id}}"]
}

query.description: Optional session ID for anonymous user tracking

request.description: Track when a user views coupon details. No auth required. Frontend should call this on coupon detail page load.
Stripe sends this webhook when payment events occur. Do not call directly - Stripe handles this.

item.name: Admin
item.description: Admin-only endpoints for dashboard, user management, and order management

request.description: Returns aggregated dashboard stats: revenue, orders, users, coupons, top performers
Returns paginated list of all users with order stats (total_orders, total_spent)
Get specific user details with aggregated order stats

query.description: Set to true to activate, false to deactivate

request.description: Activate or deactivate a user account
Returns paginated list of all orders with user info
Get specific order details (admin can view any order)

query.description: Sort by: views, redemptions, or rate
